About this website

This website is built to use technology in solving real health issues.

What is NAFLD? - NAFLD stands for Non-Alcoholic Fatty Liver Disease. It happens when excess fat builds up in the liver of people who drink little or no alcohol. It is commonly associated with conditions like obesity, high cholesterol, and diabetes.

How does this website work? - The website collects basic health indicators such as age, BMI, liver enzymes (ALT, AST), blood pressure, and Cholesterol. Based on predefined rules, it gives a basic risk assessment result.

Disclaimer - This is not a medical diagnostic tool. For a clinical diagnosis, please consult a healthcare¬†professional.
